
# Plots

## Petals 
```{r}
hchart(iris, "scatter", hcaes(x = Petal.Width, y = Petal.Length)) %>% 
      hc_exporting(enabled = TRUE,
                 filename = "Demography_Landscapes_Plot", 
                 csv = NULL )

```
